se.lth.cs.pt.fractal

Class MandelbrotGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.lth.cs.pt.fractal.MandelbrotGUI

  • public class MandelbrotGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The graphical user interface for the Mandelbrot assignment. Initial version by Christian Andersson.

    May 09, PH: added proportional zooming, removed double buffering, removed some interface options, added "Extra" text field, added constructor for variable image width, simplified layouts, cleaned up a lot.

      • RENDER

        public static final int RENDER
        Render command.

        This constant is returned by getCommand() when the user presses the RENDER button.

        See Also:
        getCommand(), Constant Field Values

      • ZOOM

        public static final int ZOOM
        Zoom command.

        This constant is returned by getCommand() when the user zooms in the picture.

        See Also:
        getCommand(), Constant Field Values

      • RESET

        public static final int RESET
        Reset command.

        This constant is returned by getCommand() when the user presses the RESET button.

        See Also:
        getCommand(), Constant Field Values

      • QUIT

        public static final int QUIT
        Quit command.

        This constant is returned by getCommand() when the user presses the QUIT button or chooses Quit in the File menu.

        See Also:
        getCommand(), Constant Field Values

      • MODE_BW

        public static final int MODE_BW
        Black and White mode.

        This is the value returned by getMode() when the user has requested a black and white image.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final int MODE_COLOR
        Color mode.

        This is the value returned by getMode() when the user has requested a color image.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MandelbrotGUI

        public MandelbrotGUI()
        Creates a graphical user interface with the default width. The height is scaled so the default complex plane can be displayed.

      • MandelbrotGUI

        public MandelbrotGUI(int width)
        Creates a graphical user interface with the specified width. The height is scaled so the default complex plane can be displayed.
        Parameters:
        width - The width in pixels.

      • getMode

        public int getMode()
        Returns the image mode.

        The mode is chosen among the two alternatives MODE_BW and MODE_COLOR, given as constants by the class.

        Returns:
        The image mode chosen by the user.
        See Also:
        MODE_BW, MODE_COLOR

      • getResolution

        public int getResolution()
        Returns the image resolution.

        The resolution is chosen among five alternatives given as constants in the class.

        Returns:
        The image resolution chosen by the user.
        See Also:
        RESOLUTION_VERY_LOW, RESOLUTION_LOW, RESOLUTION_MEDIUM, RESOLUTION_HIGH, RESOLUTION_VERY_HIGH

      • getCommand

        public int getCommand()
        Returns a command triggered by the user.

        The possible return values are defined as constants in the class.

        Returns:
        A command triggered by the user.
        See Also:
        QUIT, RENDER, ZOOM, RESET

      • clearPlane

        public void clearPlane()
        Clears the image plane.

      • resetPlane

        public void resetPlane()
        Resets the axis limits to their default values.

      • putData

        public void putData(java.awt.Color[][] image,
           int pixelWidth,
           int pixelHeight)
        Draws an image on the complex plane.

        An image represented as a matrix of colors is drawn on the complex plane of the interface. Matrix element [0][0] is drawn at image position (0,0).

        Parameters:
        image - A matrix of color objects, each of whose elements is interpreted as a picture element of the image to draw.
        pixelWidth - The width of a picture element.
        pixelHeight - The height of a picture element.
